resources.string: Mindfullness meditation is just one of many types of meditation, and it promotes presence in the now through focusing on breathing
It is a way of living your life, its basic concepts are awareness, openess and presence in the here and now
On the other hand, meditation is a technique used by many(including the mindfulness school of thought) to achieve an elevated state of mind
Choose an option for now.You can explore other options later
Let\'s see how you\nare feeling now
Take a moment to check with yourself.How are you feeling?

Learning the right breathing techniques can help you feel more connected to youur body by bringing awareness away from the worrie in your head.\nIf you force your mind back to breathing, you are missing out on the whole point of meditation: self acceptance and achieving a heightened sense of consciousness.
